description: Alteration of roof from hip to gable end; rear roof extension incorporating a Juliet balcony/terrace and installation of three roof lights to front roof slope (following removal of roof side addition, rear roof extension and rooflight to front roofslope); alteration to side elevation involving installation of two windows (following removal of existing two windows) (first floor flat)
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawing numbers: Site Location Plan; Block Plan; 1760-01 (Existing Ground Floor Plan); 1760-02 (Existing First Floor Plan); 1760-03 (Existing Second Floor Plan); 1760-04 (Existing Elevations); 1760-05 (Proposed Ground Floor Plan); 1760-06 (Proposed First Floor Plan); 1760-07 (Proposed Second Floor Plan); 1760-08 (Proposed Elevations).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the host property and local area, in accordance with Policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies 7.4 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013).

| The proposed first floor level side elevation windows of the hereby approved development shall at no time be openable or glazed, otherwise than in obscured glass, below a minimum height of 1.7 metres (5'7") above the relevant floor level.
Reason: To ensure that the proposed development does not prejudice the amenities of adjoining occupiers, in accordance with Policy 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
